textContent:
I swear to never again physically harm my family. To never hit, slap, punch, kick, or otherwise bring physical harm to anyone. No matter how much control has been lost. No control is worth the physical and mental harm caused. It will never again be method of discipline or persuasion. Ever. 

Instead, I will find another solution, namely empowering or cocreating a solution that works. 

Love is service 

To Love is to serve is to love

TO LOVE IS TO SERVE IS
title: I swear to do no harm.
textContentHtml:
I swear to never again physically harm my family. To never hit, slap, punch, kick, or otherwise bring physical harm to anyone. No matter how much control has been lost. No control is worth the physical and mental harm caused. It will never again be method of discipline or persuasion. Ever. 


Instead, I will find another solution, namely empowering or cocreating a solution that works. 


Love is service 


To Love is to serve is to love


TO LOVE IS TO SERVE IS
